body: What I meant is that since the season switch only makes sense on the current season, the season switcher class doesn't necessarily be passed a season instance. It can grab it itself by calling `Season.current`. Your approach definitely looks cleaner, I was only thinking if passing a season instance to the constructor would suggest that it actually makes any sense to pass a different season.
